summary: This is an email from the DOJ's voicemail system forwarding a voice message from a wireless caller to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims contact address. The email includes an audio attachment of the message.

events.title: Voice message forwarded to Epstein victims contact
events.description: A voice message from a wireless caller was forwarded via email to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims contact address.

keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York maintained a dedicated email address (USANYS.EpsteinVictims@usa.doj.gov) for Epstein victims to contact them.
On August 2, 2019, a voice message from a wireless caller was forwarded to this victims contact address.
The message was sent as an audio attachment to an email from the DOJ's voicemail system.
This document shows the operational process for collecting potential victim communications during the Epstein investigation.
The timing (August 2019) coincides with Epstein's arrest and the subsequent investigation into his activities.
